definitions.definition: A sheet of copper or steel used in the construction of a boiler .
The rating plate or nameplate required to be affixed to a boiler by the Boiler Explosions Act (1882).
A plate attached to industrial machinery, identifying information such as manufacturer , model number, serial number , and power requirements.
Standard text of a legal or official nature added to documents or labels .
examples: They put that boilerplate on all the warning labels.

definitions.definition: A standard piece of program code used routinely and added with a text editor or word processor .
Hard , icy snow which may be dangerous for skiing .

main_definition: A sheet of copper or steel used in the construction of a boiler .
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) The rating plate or nameplate required to be affixed to a boiler by the Boiler Explosions Act (1882).
A plate attached to industrial machinery, identifying information such as manufacturer , model number, serial number , and power requirements.
Standard text of a legal or official nature added to documents or labels .
( computing ) A standard piece of program code used routinely and added with a text editor or word processor .
( skiing ) Hard , icy snow which may be dangerous for skiing .
